hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set +x
CLI=/var/lib/jenkins/jenkins-cli.jar HOST=http://localhost:8080/ DOCKER_PUSH_LOG_FILE=/var/lib/jenkins/jobs/kuali-research-3-docker-push-image/lastSuccessful/log EC2_IDS=("i-0534c4e38e6a24009" "i-07d7b5f3e629e89ae"); ECR_REGISTRY_URL=730096353738.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com GIT_SCRIPT_URL=git@github.com:bu-ist/kuali-research-docker.git GIT_SCRIPT_BRANCH=bu-master
source /var/lib/jenkins/cli-credentials.sh
LANDSCAPE="$(echo $LANDSCAPE | sed 's/,//g')" VERSION=$(cat ${DOCKER_PUSH_LOG_FILE} | grep -P 'digest' | cut -d ':' -f 1 | tr -d '[[:space:]]');
case "$LANDSCAPE" in "qa") EC2_IDS=("i-011ccd29dec6c6d10");; "stage") EC2_IDS=("i-090d188ea237c8bcf" "i-0cb479180574b4ba2");; "prod") EC2_IDS=("i-0534c4e38e6a24009" "i-07d7b5f3e629e89ae");; esac
for i in $(seq ${#EC2_IDS[@]}); do EC2_ID=${EC2_IDS[i-1]}
CMD="java -jar ${CLI} -s ${HOST} build 'kuali-research-4-docker-run-container' -v -f \ -p ECR_REGISTRY_URL=${ECR_REGISTRY_URL} \ -p EC2_INSTANCE_ID=${EC2_ID} \ -p POM_VERSION=${VERSION} \ -p REGISTRY_REPO_NAME=coeus"
CMD_PRINTABLE="$(echo "$CMD" | sed 's/[[:space:]][[:space:]]*\-p/\n\0/g')" printf "\n$CMD_PRINTABLE\n"
# echo "$CMD" eval "$CMD"
done
set -x
